1344:6: paratra loko na tathātinirdayaḥ pravartate tāpanakarmaṇāripau|
1344:7: yathā parārthaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhatāpane kṛpātmakaḥ svātmani saṃpravartate||3||
1344:11: tathāgatajñānamanuttaraṃ padaṃ parārtha eṣa tryadhiko daśātmakaḥ||5||
1344:13: kṣamā ca dāntā ca sudūragā'kṣayā jinātmajānāṃ pratipattiruttamā||6||
1344:14: mahābhaye kāmijanaḥ pravartate cale viparyāsasukhe bhavapriyaḥ|
1344:15: pratisvamādhipraśame śamapriyaḥ sadā tu sarvādhiga[śa]me kṛpātmakaḥ||7||
1344:16: jano vimūḍhaḥ svasukhārthamudyataḥ sadā tadaprāpya paraiti duḥkhatām|
1344:17: sadā tu dhīro hi parārthamudyato dvayārthamādhāya paraiti nirvṛtim||8||
1344:18: yathā yathā hyakṣavicitragocare pravartate cāragato jinātmajaḥ|
1344:21: akāmakāreṇa hi viprapattayo jane bhavantīti kṛpāvivṛddhitaḥ||10||
